dict.acceptation: 恢复（某种情况或感受）；使复原；使复位；使复职；

sent.orig: Enchant Bracer-Restore Mana Prime: Permanently enchants bracers to restore 6 mana every 5 seconds.
sent.trans: 使一副护腕永久的获得5秒回复6点法力值的效果。

sent.orig: It also allows you to access PlayStation Store and to purchase, backup and restore PSP games.
sent.trans: 它还允许您访问游戏商店以及购买，备份和恢复PSP游戏。

sent.orig: The dot product imprinted burliness, overprinter quasi-three, restore, see double streak-free.
sent.trans: 这些产物痕迹单弱、网点还原好、套印准、无条痕、无轻影。

sent.orig: The army was called in to restore law and order to this region.
sent.trans: 军队被派来恢复该地治安。

sent.orig: There are plans to restore another 50 building structures of important historical and cultural value.
sent.trans: 力争五年内再修缮50处文物建筑。
